Trombone Champ

By Developer + Holy Wow Studios

Featured: October 2022

Play or Learn More

Trombone Champ is the world’s first trombone-based rhythm music game. Unlike most music games, you can freely play any note at any time. You’re not just following along with the music, you’re actually playing the music! Play over 20 songs, collect all 50 Tromboner Cards, and discover the secrets of the Trombiverse!

About the Developer

Holy Wow is a two-person game development team based in Brooklyn, NY. We are the creators of TROMBONE CHAMP, the ICARUS PROUDBOTTOM series, and other "stupid and/or funny games".

Open Collective

Games Y'all is a meetup presented by The Museum of Human Achievement. We endeavor to celebrate, amplify, and support the unique and underrepresented within indie games and beyond.
